name: MovieJam!
description:
Have you ever wanted to make your own movies? Probably not, but in this game, you can do just that!

Build your own sets, hire your own actors, pick the music, you control EVERYTHING!

Enjoy the wide variety of characters that are not based on any existing IPs or real life celebrities!

Each movie you make will be judged by the one and only John Movie, a man so dedicated to the art of the silver screen, he legally had his last name changed to movie!

So why not give it a try? I love it, and so will you*!

*You might not love it
